str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: From blasphemos; to vilify; specially, to speak impiously.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Accusative Neuter Plural
str2: How much, how great, how many, as great as, as much. By reduplication from hos; as As.

parse: Verb - Perfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural

str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.
Probably adverb of comparative from hos; which how, i.e. In that manner.
Without reason, irrational; contrary to reason, absurd. Irrational.
An animal, living creature. Neuter of a derivative of zao; a live thing, i.e. An animal.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To corrupt, spoil, destroy, ruin. Probably strengthened from phthio; properly, to shrivel or wither, i.e. To spoil or to ruin.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To know, know of, understand. Apparently a middle voice of ephistemi; to put the mind upon, i.e. Comprehend, or be acquainted with.
